def main():
    # Read input
    N = int(input())

    # Calculate the number of 1000-yen bills required
    num_1000_yen_bills = N // 1000

    # Calculate the change
    change = N % 1000

    # Print the change
    print(change)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
